Room.Name: Forest Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Forest Road, which runs south to Lyanden Road, and north to the ancient burial grounds of imps, gnomes and leprachauns.
Room.LongDescription: A small stream is flowing across the road, and a footbridge crosses over it. A sign is on the other side, but you cannot read it from here. You can hear an odd noise underneath the wooden structure, sort of a snapping sound. A good forest path is to the northeast.
